TheCursedMod:BleedKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Bleeding creature loses HP whenever it Attacks. Each turn, Bleed is reduced by #b1.

TheCursedMod:CircleKeyword.DESCRIPTION: An #yUnplayable card that can be activated by using other cards while in hand.

TheCursedMod:CursedKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Any card with the word "Cursed" in its name. Using it will make Dregs or random Curse cards.

TheCursedMod:RiteKeyword.DESCRIPTION: When using, choose 1 card to #yExhaust. Selecting a Curse card will activate the Rite's effect.
